solution_line_template: Angelo and Melanie think they should dedicate {hours_per_chapter} hours to each of the {num_chapters} chapters, {hours_per_chapter} hours x {num_chapters} chapters = <<{hours_per_chapter}*{num_chapters}={chapter_study_hours}>>{chapter_study_hours} hours total.

For the worksheets they plan to dedicate {hours_per_worksheet} hours for each worksheet, {hours_per_worksheet} hours x {num_worksheets} worksheets = <<{hours_per_worksheet}*{num_worksheets}={worksheet_study_hours}>>{worksheet_study_hours} hours total.

Angelo and Melanie need to start with planning {total_initial_study_hours} hours to study, at {max_hours_per_day} hours a day, {total_initial_study_hours} / {max_hours_per_day} = <<{total_initial_study_hours}/{max_hours_per_day}={initial_study_days}>>{initial_study_days} days.

However, they need to include time for breaks and lunch. Every hour they want to include a {break_minutes_per_hour}-minute break, so {total_initial_study_hours} total hours x {break_minutes_per_hour} minutes = <<{total_initial_study_hours}*{break_minutes_per_hour}={total_hourly_break_minutes}>>{total_hourly_break_minutes} extra minutes for breaks.

They also want to include {num_snack_breaks} {minutes_per_snack_break}-minute snack breaks, {num_snack_breaks} x {minutes_per_snack_break} minutes = <<{num_snack_breaks}*{minutes_per_snack_break}={total_snack_break_minutes}>>{total_snack_break_minutes} minutes.

And they want to include {lunch_minutes_per_day} minutes for lunch each day, so {total_hourly_break_minutes} minutes for breaks + {total_snack_break_minutes} minutes for snack breaks + {lunch_minutes_per_day} minutes for lunch = {total_extra_minutes} minutes, or {total_extra_minutes} / {minutes_per_hour} minutes per hour = {total_extra_hours} extra hours.

So Angelo and Melanie want to plan {total_initial_study_hours} hours to study + {total_extra_hours} hours of breaks = <<{total_initial_study_hours}+{total_extra_hours}={total_study_hours_with_breaks}>>{total_study_hours_with_breaks} hours total.

They want to study no more than {max_hours_per_day} hours each day, {total_study_hours_with_breaks} hours / {max_hours_per_day} hours each day = <<{total_study_hours_with_breaks}/{max_hours_per_day}={calculated_days_needed}>>{calculated_days_needed}
They will need to plan to study {final_study_days} days to allow for all the time they need.
